snippet: The two men at the controls of Flight 370 led ordinary lives that revolved around family and flying, those who knew them said.
abstract: Relatives, friends and colleagues of two pilots at helm of Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 line up in their defense, saying it is unimaginable that they could have played a role in any sinister plot involving the plane's disappearance.
lead_paragraph: The two men at the controls of Flight 370 led ordinary lives that revolved around family and flying, those who knew them said.

headline.seo: Pilots’ Possible Role in Flight 370 Vanishing ‘Unthinkable’ to Friends
headline.main: Pilots’ Possible Role in Flight 370 Vanishing ‘Unthinkable’ to Friends
headline.print_headline: Possible Role for Pilots ‘Unthinkable’ to Friends
